@AndynBrown16 @EnvAgencyNW @K_Fletcher_MP I remember the Croston floods. Many thanks to everyone working hard to prevent flooding.

urls.title: Flood Resilience and Response
urls.description: Flooding is an important issue and climate change is likely to increase the risk of flooding in the future. The council works closely with the Environment Agency and other partners e.g. United Utilities, in order to minimise the risk to people and property.

text:
✅ Sign up for flood warning messages from the @EnvAgency Floodline 0345 988 1188
✅ Make a personal Flood Plan for what you will do if there is a flood
✅ Think what you would take if you needed to evacuate & consider where everything could be kept

https://t.co/iMMBJo2yUU https://t.co/WufQrrbK2H
